packages.title: Signature Drip IV
packages.description: IV Drip with Hydration, B Complex, Amino Acids, Triple B12, Zinc, Selenium, Glutathione, Magnesium. Includes Vitamin D and CoQ10 Injections.
packages.details: Includes Basic Hydration + B Complex + Amino Acids + Triple B12 + Zinc 6mg + Selenium 50mcg + Glutathione 1.2g + Magnesium 1g. Vitamin D 30,000IU + CoQ10 25mg injection.
